Team Responsible: Sales Purpose: Description of Customers Mission/Vision
[Q3-2023] TASK0923990: Update field type from Long Text Area(32768) to Text Area (Rich) (5000)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: A customer's mission statement describes what a company wants to do now. A company's vision statement outlines what a company wants to be in the future
CustomField.label: Customer's Mission / Vision
